movies.Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.Actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
movies.Plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.Title: Soul
movies.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
movies.Writer: Pete Docter (story and screenplay by), Mike Jones (story and screenplay by), Kemp Powers (story and screenplay by)
movies.Actors: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House
movies.Plot: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul learning about herself.

movies.Title: Gemini
movies.Actors: Lola Kirke, Zoë Kravitz, John Cho, Greta Lee
movies.Plot: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a tenacious personal assistant and her Hollywood starlet boss. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

movies.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.Writer: James Gunn, Nicole Perlman, Dan Abnett (based on the Marvel comics by), Andy Lanning (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Mantlo (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Keith Giffen (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Jim Starlin (characters created by: Drax the Destroyer, Gamora & Thanos), Steve Englehart (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gan (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gerber (character created by: Howard the Duck), Val Mayerik (character created by: Howard the Duck)

movies.Plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 52 wins & 100 nominations.
movies.Production: Marvel Studios, Moving Picture Company, Marvel Enterprises

movies.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.Writer: Eric Pearson, Craig Kyle, Christopher L. Yost, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Larry Lieber (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel comics by)
movies.Actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba
movies.Plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

movies.Title: Ratatouille

movies.Plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
